Title: Authorizes the village of South Nyack, or its successor municipality, to establish a residential parking system
Summary: Authorizes the board of trustees of the village of South Nyack, or its successor municipality to provide for a residential parking permit system to be in effect on the weekends and holidays between April first and October thirty-first and fix and require the payment of fees applicable to parking within the area in which such parking system is in effect; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง1662-f, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a residential parking system in the village of South Nyack, or its successor municipality
